desktop.shortcut.comment: Install and play itch.io games easily
grid.item.open_in_file_explorer: Open installation folder in file explorer
grid.item.open_in_file_explorer_linux: Open installation folder in file manager
grid.item.open_in_file_explorer_osx: Show in Finder where this item is installed
grid.item.probe: Open this item's event log to find cause of failure (Advanced)
grid.item.purchase_or_donate: Purchase or donate money towards item
grid.item.retry: Try downloading / installing / launching this item again
login.status.dependency_check: Making sure we have everything set up…
login.status.setup_failure: There was a problem during setup: {{error}}
onboarding.caved.prealpha_reminder: Keep in mind this is a pre-alpha
onboarding.caved.troubleshoot_advice: If something breaks, click {{report}} to report it, or {{probe}} to investigate.
onboarding.caved.usage: Watch games quietly download, install, and run.
onboarding.collections.auto_sync: Your games will be here when you come back.
onboarding.collections.usage: Browse the site a little, then use {{add_to_collection}} to start organizing.
onboarding.dashboard.mission_statement: We've tried to make it the comfiest.
onboarding.dashboard.selling_points: Instant set-up, and as few barriers as we can manage.
onboarding.owned.batteries_included: We've put together a few collections so you can start playing right away.
onboarding.owned.navigation_hint: Click the labels on your left to navigate around the app
onboarding.owned.reassuring_comment: Things are looking a bit empty right now, but no worries!
preferences.install_location.browse: Open install location in file explorer
preferences.install_location.browse_linu: Open install location in file manager
preferences.install_location.delete: Remove this install location and uninstall its contents
preferences.install_location.is_default: New items will install to this location by default.
preferences.install_location.make_defaul: Set this as the default install location
prompt.uninstall.message: Are you sure you want to uninstall {{title}}?
prompt.additional_purchase.detail:
...but you could still buy a copy for a friend!

Do you want to make another purchase?
prompt.additional_purchase.message: You already own a copy of {{title}}.
prompt.additional_purchase.title: You already own this!
prompt.crash_reporter.detail: A crash log has been written to {{location}}.
prompt.add_install_location.title: Pick a new install location
prompt.install_location_not_empty.detail: It needs to be done manually for the time being.
prompt.install_location_not_empty.messag: Install locations can only be removed when all their contents has been uninstalled.
prompt.install_location_not_empty.title: This install location is not empty
prompt.remove_install_location.detail: Any items installed at {{location}} will be uninstalled.
prompt.remove_install_location.message: Are you sure you want to remove this location?
prompt.remove_install_location.title: Removing an install location
prompt.last_remaining_install_location.c: This is the last remaining install location, and it cannot be removed until another is added first.
prompt.logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
prompt.no_compatible_version.detail: Perhaps this {{classification}} isn't compatible with it yet?
prompt.no_compatible_version.message: We couldn't find a version of {{title}} for {{platform}}.
prompt.no_compatible_version.title: {{title}} on {{platform}}
prompt.payments_disabled.detail: Maybe you can find another way to support them?
prompt.payments_disabled.message: Unfortunately, the developer of {{title}} does not accept payments for this title.
prompt.payments_disabled.title: Payments disabled
prompt.rar_policy.title: RAR is not supported
prompt.rar_policy.message: {{title}} uses the RAR compression format, and cannot be installed with itch until it is repackaged.
prompt.rar_policy.detail: RAR is an outdated and non-free format, and will never be supported.
prompt.deb_policy.title: APT packages are not supported
prompt.deb_policy.message: {{title}} uses the .deb package format, and cannot be installed with itch until it is repackaged.
prompt.deb_policy.detail: itch can only install portable versions of Linux applications.
prompt.rpm_policy.title: YUM packages are not supported
prompt.rpm_policy.message: {{title}} uses the .rpm package format, and cannot be installed with itch until it is repackaged.
prompt.rpm_policy.detail: itch can only install portable versions of Linux applications.
prompt.url_install.title: Install request
